attributes.title: Horrifying, laggy, Terrible app 🤬🤬
attributes.review: This app took 3 days to download. THREE DARN DAYS!!! That’s 72 hours. Which is 259,200 seconds!!!! Imagine the work I could’ve got done in that time. 😡 but instead I was waiting for the app to download 😐. Now when the app loaded, momo popped up and I got scared so I trew my phone and it broke, DONALD J TRUMP, YOU OWE ME A NEW PHONE! 🤬 I WILL NOT TOLERATE THIS APP AND NEITHER WILL ANYONE ELSE. NOBODY LIKES YOUR ORANGE DUMB DUMB HEAD AND THATS WHY YOU ALWASY GOTTA LIE🍊  but it’s okay smh we will get justice.

attributes.title: This app RUINED my marriage
attributes.review: I tried to download this app and it crashed my entire phone! I had the app open for five minvtes and it took my battery from 95% all the way down to 20%! Absolvtely ridicvlovs. It rvined the software on my phone and now I can’t vse some of the keys on my key board and have to vse “v” instead. Anyway, also my wife divorced me becavse this app, for obviovs reasons.

attributes.title: Worst Mistake
attributes.review: This app glitches out my whole phone. I had to rest it so many times. My friend Abor Shawn also has the same problem. He had to get a new phone because it gave my phone a bug. My whole phone is slow now and the app didn’t work. Do not make this mistake it will mess up your whole phone.

attributes.title: this app takes all of your information!!!
attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded the app it asked for my phone number, address, and credit card. I entered it in because i trust my wonderful president but it billed my credit card $6,000 for no reason!!!! i would not recommend this to anyone please do not download this!!

attributes.title: bunker baby 😘😍🥴
attributes.review: trump the bunker baby is just a little sensitive yet won’t talk about how many kids he molested. he golfed, tanned, and tweeted more than be our president, he solved nothing and most the people saying “trump 2020” having nothing to back it up with. gen z won’t go down without a fight, bunker baby 👶🏼. so stay trying to take things from us just because you get fact checked because ur wrong 🤡. gen z is one big family and we have other apps to move too but don’t expect us to not come back and take things from you, u saw what we did with google classroom 🥰

It’s clownery.

I downloaded this app to praise my man Donald only to find out he’s a rapist, a sexist, a bully, a baby, a lier who has daddy issues, a homophobic white supremacists, a sociopath, a narcissist, and a corrupt criminal who is morbidly obese. 👁👄👁

After this revelation, I decided to inject myself with Lysol so when I go to the gun range I wouldn’t get the Rona 🦠. Turns out I actually injected myself with my cats pee 🐈 and got rabies. 

I got rushed to the ICU where I saw the cult of trump supports yelling at the doctors for helping them. One had the audacity to yell at a card bird cut out of a doctor, saying “Get ya darn finguuurs off my git darnnn truck! Y’all bastarrdddz. I blame them libtards”

attributes.title: terrible
attributes.review: I have never been more disappointed with an app in my entire life. it took forever to download, barely works, takes forever to open. it’s ridiculous. not to mention all the users are supporting a racist! gross do not let your kids download this! it will corrupt their head and make them stupid!
